meanings.definition: A type of hydrangea with large, round flower clusters.
meanings.sent1: In the garden, the mopheads bloomed beautifully in shades of pink and blue.
meanings.sent2: The florist recommended planting mopheads for a colorful addition to the yard.
meanings.sent3: The mopheads in the flower bed looked like fluffy pom-poms waving in the breeze.
meanings.sent4: Her bouquet was a burst of mopheads, brightening up the room.
meanings.sent5: The mopheads in the vase brought a touch of nature indoors.

meanings.definition: A person with a head of hair that is messy or unkempt.
meanings.sent1: After playing outside, the children returned with mopheads full of twigs and leaves.
meanings.sent2: She hurriedly brushed her mopheads before heading out for the day.
meanings.sent3: The wind turned his neat hairstyle into mopheads that stood on end.
meanings.sent4: Her mopheads were a wild tangle of curls that seemed to have a life of their own.
meanings.sent5: The mopheads of the little girl made her look like a playful lion cub.
